trans-unit.source: Represents the method that handles the **DefaultAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** event of a <xref href="System.Web.Security.DefaultAuthenticationModule"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Representerer metoden som behandler den **DefaultAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** hendelse for en <xref href="System.Web.Security.DefaultAuthenticationModule"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The DefaultAuthenticationEventHandler delegate is defined for the <xref:System.Web.Security.DefaultAuthenticationModule.Authenticate> event of the <xref:System.Web.Security.DefaultAuthenticationModule> class.
trans-unit.target: Representanten DefaultAuthenticationEventHandler er definert for <xref:System.Web.Security.DefaultAuthenticationModule.Authenticate>hendelsen for <xref:System.Web.Security.DefaultAuthenticationModule>klasse.</xref:System.Web.Security.DefaultAuthenticationModule> </xref:System.Web.Security.DefaultAuthenticationModule.Authenticate>

trans-unit.source: You can access the <xref:System.Web.Security.DefaultAuthenticationModule.Authenticate> event of the <xref:System.Web.Security.DefaultAuthenticationModule> class by specifying a subroutine named **DefaultAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** in the Global.asax file for your ASP.NET application.
trans-unit.target: Du har tilgang til den <xref:System.Web.Security.DefaultAuthenticationModule.Authenticate>hendelsen til den <xref:System.Web.Security.DefaultAuthenticationModule>klassen ved å angi en underrutine navnet **DefaultAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** i filen Global.asax for ASP.NET-program.</xref:System.Web.Security.DefaultAuthenticationModule> </xref:System.Web.Security.DefaultAuthenticationModule.Authenticate>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.DefaultAuthenticationModule.Authenticate> event is raised after the <xref:System.Web.HttpApplication.AuthenticateRequest> event and is used to ensure that the <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A> property of the current <xref:System.Web.HttpContext> is populated with an <xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal> object.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.Security.DefaultAuthenticationModule.Authenticate>denne hendelsen oppstår når den <xref:System.Web.HttpApplication.AuthenticateRequest>hendelsen og brukes til å sikre at den <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A>for gjeldende <xref:System.Web.HttpContext>er fylt med en <xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal>objektet.</xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal> </xref:System.Web.HttpContext> </xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A> </xref:System.Web.HttpApplication.AuthenticateRequest> </xref:System.Web.Security.DefaultAuthenticationModule.Authenticate>

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Web.Security.DefaultAuthenticationEventArgs.Context%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.Security.DefaultAuthenticationEventArgs> object supplied to the **DefaultAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** event to set the <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A> property of the current <xref:System.Web.HttpContext> to a custom <xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal> object.
trans-unit.target: Du kan bruke den <xref:System.Web.Security.DefaultAuthenticationEventArgs.Context%2A>for den <xref:System.Web.Security.DefaultAuthenticationEventArgs>objektet som er angitt for den **DefaultAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** -hendelsen for å angi den <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A>for gjeldende <xref:System.Web.HttpContext>til en egendefinert <xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal>objektet.</xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal> </xref:System.Web.HttpContext> </xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A> </xref:System.Web.Security.DefaultAuthenticationEventArgs> </xref:System.Web.Security.DefaultAuthenticationEventArgs.Context%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you do not specify a value for the <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.HttpContext> supplied during the **DefaultAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** event, the <xref:System.Web.Security.DefaultAuthenticationModule> sets the <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.HttpContext> to a <xref:System.Security.Principal.GenericPrincipal> object that contains no user information.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du ikke angir en verdi for den <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A>for den <xref:System.Web.HttpContext>levert under den **DefaultAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** hendelsen i <xref:System.Web.Security.DefaultAuthenticationModule>angir den <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A>for den <xref:System.Web.HttpContext>til en <xref:System.Security.Principal.GenericPrincipal>objekt som inneholder ingen brukerinformasjon.</xref:System.Security.Principal.GenericPrincipal> </xref:System.Web.HttpContext> </xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A> </xref:System.Web.Security.DefaultAuthenticationModule> </xref:System.Web.HttpContext> </xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A>

trans-unit.source: The **DefaultAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** event is raised after the <xref:System.Web.HttpApplication.AuthenticateRequest> event and before the <xref:System.Web.HttpApplication.AuthorizeRequest> event.
trans-unit.target: Den **DefaultAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** denne hendelsen oppstår når den <xref:System.Web.HttpApplication.AuthenticateRequest>hendelsen og før den <xref:System.Web.HttpApplication.AuthorizeRequest>hendelsen.</xref:System.Web.HttpApplication.AuthorizeRequest> </xref:System.Web.HttpApplication.AuthenticateRequest>

trans-unit.source: If you have an section that depends on the user name to deny or allow access to your application, modifying the <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A> property of the current <xref:System.Web.HttpContext> can affect the behavior of your application.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du har en inndeling som er avhengig av brukernavnet for å tillate tilgang til programmet eller, endring av <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A>for gjeldende <xref:System.Web.HttpContext>kan påvirke virkemåten for programmet.</xref:System.Web.HttpContext> </xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A>

trans-unit.source: Be sure that the user name you set during the **DefaultAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** event is considered when you specify the section in your configuration.
trans-unit.target: Kontroller at brukernavnet du setter under den **DefaultAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** hendelsen anses når du angir delen i konfigurasjonen.
